Pre-Game Insights: England and West Indies are each competing for an unprecedented third T20 World Cup title
West Indies come into this contest on an eight-match unbeaten run
England's campaign can begin in earnest now, which is just as well, because they are about to bump into a team with no such concerns to weigh them down.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This will be another outing for the belter of a surface on which West Indies racked up 218 for 5 against Afghanistan on Monday
England have played three previous T20Is in St Lucia, and have never yet lost a game. Two of those came during their triumph World T20 campaign in 2010
Others: West Indies vs England 42nd Match, Super Eights, Group 2 (N), Gros Islet, June 19, 2024, ICC Men's T20 World Cup
England won by 8 wickets (with 15 balls remaining)
